name: 簡永彬
objective:
今年課程有所更改，原本課程為傳統攝影的影像處理訓練，今年度，加入數位創作的課程，學生們可以選擇以傳統底片機、或數位相機來創作。
透過明式暗房（即經過數位底片的噴墨的替代底片的轉印）操作，培養學生對影像品質的概念外，建構系列式、主題性的作品實踐，訓練學生對事物的敏感度，及攝影藝術美學的實踐能力 。
This year's course has been changed. The original course was image processing training for traditional photography. This year, a digital creation course is added. Students can choose to create with traditional film machines or digital cameras.
Through the operation in the bright darkroom (that is, the transfer of the alternative negative film through the inkjet of the digital negative film), the students are cultivated in addition to the concept of image quality, and the practice of serial and thematic works is constructed to train students' sensitivity to things and photography The practical ability of artistic aesthetics.
